entities.sql: SELECT edu_base_course.course_type_id , edu_base_course.`name` AS course_base_name , edu_course.start_time AS course_start_time , edu_course.end_time AS course_end_time , edu_course.campus_id , edu_course.classroom_id , edu_course.teacher_employee_id , edu_student.`name` AS student_name , edu_student.phone AS student_phone , edu_course. NAME AS course_name , edu_student.level_id AS student_level_id , edu_student.all_class_hours AS student_all_class_hours , edu_student.used_class_hours AS student_used_class_hours , edu_course_sign.sign_student_level_id , edu_course_sign.sign_type , edu_campus. NAME AS campus_name , edu_campus_classroom. NAME AS classroom_name , `user`.`nickname` AS teacher_name , edu_course_sign.student_remark , edu_course_sign.`status` AS sign_status FROM edu_course_sign LEFT JOIN edu_course ON edu_course.id = edu_course_sign.course_id LEFT JOIN edu_base_course ON edu_base_course.id = edu_course.base_course_id LEFT JOIN edu_student ON edu_student.id = edu_course_sign.student_id LEFT JOIN edu_campus ON edu_campus.id = edu_course.campus_id LEFT JOIN edu_campus_classroom ON edu_campus_classroom.id = edu_course.classroom_id LEFT JOIN edu_employee ON edu_employee.id = edu_course.teacher_employee_id LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.id = edu_employee.user_id

fields.name: 校区
fields.sql: select name as `value` from edu_campus where id = ${campus_id}

fields.name: 当前套餐
fields.sql: select name as `value` from edu_packet where id = ${current_packet_id}

fields.name: 等级
fields.sql: select name as `value` from edu_student_level where id = ${level_id}

fields.name: 所属老师
fields.sql: select `user`.id as `key`, `user`.nickname as `value` from edu_employee left join `user` on `user`.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id =  ${teacher_id}

fields.data_source_sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_instrument_type

fields.sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_instrument_use where id = ${instrument_use_id}

fields.name: 获取信息人
fields.sql: select edu_employee.id as `key`, user.nickname as `value` from edu_employee left join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id=${recommend_employee_id}

fields.name: 客户联系人
fields.sql: select edu_employee.id as `key`, user.nickname as `value` from edu_employee left join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id=${connect_employee_id}

fields.name: 订单数
fields.sql: select count(1) as number from edu_order where edu_order.customer_id = ${id}

fields.sql: select count(1) as number from edu_business where edu_business.customer_id = ${id}

fields.name: 校区

fields.name: 乐器类型
fields.sql: select id as `key`,  name as `value` from edu_instrument_type where id = ${instrument_type_id}

fields.data_source_sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_customer where id = ${customer_id}

fields.sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_customer where id = ${customer_id}

fields.name: 联系方式

fields.name: 销售顾问
fields.sql: select edu_employee.id as `key`, user.nickname as `value` from edu_employee inner join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id=${sale_employee_id}

fields.name: 校区
fields.sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_campus where id = ${campus_id}

fields.name: 当前套餐
fields.sql: SELECT id as `key`, name as `value` FROM `edu_packet` where id = ${packet_id}

fields.name: 商机
fields.sql: SELECT id as `key`, name as `value` FROM `edu_business` where id = ${business_id}

fields.name: 乐器类型
fields.sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_instrument_type where id = ${instrument_type_id}

fields.name: 联系客户人

fields.name: 试听课教师
fields.sql: select edu_employee.id as `key`, user.nickname as `value` from edu_employee left join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id=${audition_teacher_employee_id}

fields.name: 获取信息人
fields.sql: select edu_employee.id as `key`, user.nickname as `value` from edu_employee left join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id=${recommend_employee_id}

entities.sql: SELECT edu_order.id, edu_order.status, edu_order.customer_id, edu_customer.`name` as customer_name, edu_customer.phone, edu_customer.sex, edu_customer.campus_id, edu_campus.name as campus_name, `user`.nickname as sales_nickname, edu_order.create_time, edu_order.order_type, edu_order.price, edu_order.pay_type, edu_order.remark FROM `edu_order` left join edu_customer on edu_order.customer_id = edu_customer.id left join edu_campus on edu_customer.campus_id = edu_campus.id left join edu_employee on edu_customer.connect_employee_id = edu_employee.id left join `user` on user.id = edu_employee.user_id

fields.name: 关联用户
fields.sql: SELECT `id` as `key`, nickname as `value` from `user`

fields.name: 校区
fields.sql: select id as `key`, name as `value` from edu_campus where id=${campus_id}

entities.sql: SELECT edu_employee.id,edu_employee.create_time, edu_employee.level, edu_employee.is_teacher, edu_employee.campus_id, edu_employee.org_id, edu_employee.user_id, user.phone, user.nickname FROM `edu_employee` left join user on edu_employee.user_id = user.id

fields.name: 校区负责人
fields.sql: select edu_employee.id as `key`, user.nickname as `value` from edu_employee left join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id=${manage_employee_id}

fields.name: 教室数

entities.sql: SELECT edu_base_course.id, edu_base_course.name, edu_course_type.id AS course_type_id, edu_base_course.crowd_type, edu_base_course.color, edu_base_course.class_points, edu_base_course.class_minutes, edu_base_course.is_enabled, edu_base_course.is_cancel, edu_base_course.create_time, edu_base_course.student_count FROM `edu_base_course` left join edu_course_type ON edu_course_type.id = edu_base_course.course_type_id
